tool_description: Search through the most famous events in history. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/historicalevents.
title: Historical Events by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/historicalevents
api_list.description: API Ninjas Historical Events API endpoint. Returns a list of up to 10 events that match the search parameters. At least one of the following parameters is required: text, year, month, day.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: query text to search events by. Use keywords or short phrases for best match results.

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: 4-digit year (e.g. 1776). For BC/BCE years, use a negative integer (e.g. -351 for 351 BC).

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: number of results to offset (for pagination).
